\SetAPI{J-C}
\section{database.host}
\label{configuration:DatabaseHost}
The host of the database. If \ref{configuration:DatabaseConnection} is not set, this field is not evaluated. However, it is much more convenient to use single properties than \ref{configuration:DatabaseConnection}.

\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{database.host}}]
database.host=127.0.0.1
\end{lstlisting}
